attributes.action: Ban all Food Store/Fuel subscription clubcards
attributes.additional_details: I would like the Govement to ban Clubcard subscriptions on Fuel and food as a start. Food and fuel prices should be avaible for all without an extra step to take or paying more than others because you haven't done a requirement, they should be upfront and honest.
attributes.background: Why should anyone have to buy a bit of plastic just to get discounts off food, including the necessities like milk, bread etc. As much as you can tap a clubcard discount with your phone without a Physical card it still is a gateway go other vital aspects of lifebeing even more managed and gatekeeped

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a clear, specific action.

We're not sure exactly whether you'd like the Government or Parliament to ban all loyalty card schemes, or only those that offer discounts.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
